scripts.link: npm run beta:link && npm run bare:link
scripts.start:app: npm run sync-assets && npm run build:script -- --no-minify && parcel serve app/index.html -p 8001 --out-dir dist/ --no-cache
scripts.devnet: ganache-cli -m "explain tackle mirror kit van hammer degree position ginger unfair soup bonus" -i 15 -l 100000000 --port 8535 -e 1000000000 -g 0xffffffff
scripts.build: npm run sync-assets && npm run build:app && npm run build:script
scripts.deploy:rpc: truffle compile && truffle exec scripts/deploy.js --network rpc
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: truffle compile && truffle exec scripts/deploy-althea-dao-factory.js --network rinkeby
scripts.deploy:kovan: truffle compile && truffle exec scripts/deploy-althea-dao-factory.js --network kovan
scripts.deploy:devnet: npm run compile && truffle exec scripts/deploy-althea-dao-factory.js --network devnet
scripts.deploy:devnet:update: npm run compile && npm run update-assets:devnet && truffle exec scripts/deploy-althea-dao-factory.js --network devnet
scripts.publish:devnet: npm run compile && aragon publish --apm.ipfs.rpc.protocol http --apm.ipfs.rpc.host ipfs.aragon.network --no-confirm=true --keyfile ../../.localkey.json "$(npm run deploy:devnet | tail -n 1)"
scripts.publish:rpc: npm run compile && aragon publish --no-confirm=true "$(npm run deploy:rpc | tail -n 1)"
scripts.publish:rinkeby: npm run compile && aragon publish --no-confirm=true --keyfile ~/.rinkebykey.json "$(npm run deploy:rinkeby | tail -n 1)"
